entry.title: jQuery.validator.format()

argument.name: argument
argument.desc: The first argument to insert, or an array of Strings to insert

argument.name: argumentN...
argument.desc: The second etc. argument to insert

entry.longdesc:
One or more arguments can be passed, in addition to the string template itself, to insert into the string.
If you're familiar with the term, this makes this function support currying. If you don't care about that, just use the first argument.

example.desc: Sets the debug setting for all validation calls.
